facebook.summary:
Can CoQ10 benefit  Glaucoma ? http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24458150

I'm not making a claim, AdvancedQ10 doesn't do that but I had glaucoma and it's gone now. 

#CanCoQ10BenefitGlaucoma  #AdvancedQ10 #MitochondriaAlteration  #CoenzymeQ10Rats
